com.liliya.quiz.model

Interface QuizService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QuizServer

    public interface QuizService
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The server functionality of the quiz system

      • createNewQuiz

        int createNewQuiz(java.lang.String name,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Question> questions)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creates a new quiz based on a list of questions provided by the set up client
        Parameters:
        name - of the quiz specified by the set up client
        questions - of the quiz specified by the set up client
        Returns:
        id of the quiz
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • closeQuiz

        java.util.List<PlayerQuizInstance> closeQuiz(int id)
                                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Stops the quiz instance upon request by set up client
        Returns:
        a PlayerQuizInstance object with the highest score for this quiz The object contains the score and details of the player for the set up client to display
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • checkQuizPlayed

        boolean checkQuizPlayed(int id)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Server checks to see if the quiz is still being played by a client Used to determine if a quiz can be closed by the set up client
        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        true or false depending on whether it is played or not
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
